name: Birth of Nari
description:
CONTROLS :
Right mouse : Drag the tiles 
Left mouse : Delete tiles (or select the target if warphole tile is triggered)
Middle mouse click (or wheel) : triggers the secondary specifitary of certains tiles (rotation tiles and warphole tile)

Camera controlls :
Right mouse (outside of the interface) : pivot 
Middle mouse wheel : zoom

HOW TO PLAY : 
Goal: Claims banana
Game over: If you not claims banana in one turn, you must reset if this is happening

HOW TO CONTROL :
You can drop tiles in the board (you must first drop in the scribbled tiles) and click on the "Play !". Depending on the situation in Nari space and of your algorithmia, you can achieve some pretty result. 

TILES LEXIC :

-Run tile (RED) : move Nari in one forward case. Trigger tile bellow ↓
-Rotation tile (BLUE) : rotate Nari in 90/-90/180° degrees dependently of your choice (middle mouse or wheel in the tile when is dropped). Trigger tile bellow ↓
-Valid tile (YELLOW) : check in one forward case if is a wall. If return false Trigger tile left ←. If return true Trigger right →
-Warphole tile (PURPLE) : When is trigger, redirect in the target (middle mouse or wheel and then left mouse for targeting). Triggers nothing if is has no target
